recipesJson.name: Cherry Berry Chew
recipesJson.author: TamVapes
recipesJson.description:
Created live on Mixing after Dark.  
**Please note Vape Train Red Chew Candy was used**  not soft candy. 
a delicious candy vape with chewy cherry and raspberry.  
Enjoy.  
Check out my one shots at:  https://www.diyflavorchaser.com/tam-vapes

reviews.text: this is so tasty thank you my new adv
